SELECT t.*, o.id orgID, o.orgName orgName, o.orgCode orgCode, sum(statusCount) AS sumStakes, '0' AS flag, sum(
IF ( stakeStatus = '空闲', statusCount, 0 ) ) AS freeCount, sum(
IF ( stakeStatus = '充电', statusCount, 0 ) ) AS chargeCount, sum(
IF ( stakeStatus = '故障', statusCount, 0 ) ) AS faultCount, sum(
IF ( stakeStatus = '离线', statusCount, 0 ) ) AS offlineCount FROM ( SELECT s.*, rt.stakeChargeStatus AS stakeStatus, COUNT(rt.stakeChargeStatus) AS statusCount FROM eomp_em_station s LEFT JOIN eomp_em_stake t ON s.ID = t.stationId LEFT JOIN eomp_rtm_stakestatus rt ON rt.stakeNum = t.stakeNumber WHERE s.ID IN ( SELECT d.bizID FROM eomp_sys_user u left join eomp_sys_datarole d on u.id = d.UserID WHERE u.userAccount = #{userAccount} AND d.bizIDFlag = 0 ) GROUP BY s.stationName, rt.stakeChargeStatus ) AS t LEFT JOIN eomp_sys_org o ON t.orgId = o.id GROUP BY stationName

SELECT a.*, IF ( b.chargeStatus = NULL, '离线', b.chargeStatus ) chargeStatus FROM eomp_em_stake a LEFT JOIN eomp_rtm_stakeportstatus b ON a.stakeNumber = b.stakeNum WHERE a.stationId = #{stationId} GROUP BY a.stakeNumber

SELECT stake.address AS stationName, stake.city AS city, stake.alias, stake.chargeCount, stake.power, stake.stakeNumber, stake.prodCode, stake.type, tem. NAME AS template, tem.brand, tem.factory, tem.sysTime, ees.updateTime, ers.stakeChargeStatus, ers.stakeStatus, sps.portStatus FROM eomp_em_stake stake LEFT JOIN eomp_em_template tem ON stake.templateId = tem.ID LEFT JOIN eomp_em_station station ON stake.stationId = station.ID LEFT JOIN eomp_em_stakecomprela ees ON stake.ID = ees.stakeId LEFT JOIN eomp_rtm_stakestatus ers ON stake.stakeNumber = ers.stakeNum LEFT JOIN eomp_rtm_stakeportstatus sps ON stake.stakeNumber = ers.stakeNum WHERE stake.stakeNumber = #{stakeNumber} limit 1

SELECT pe.partName AS NAME, ale.CODE AS VALUE FROM ( SELECT sl.stakeNum, sl.alarm AS CODE FROM eomp_rtm_stakealarm sl WHERE sl.repairstatus = 0 AND sl.stakeNum = #{stakeNumber} UNION SELECT sf.stakeNum, sf.fault AS CODE FROM eomp_rtm_stakefault sf WHERE sf.repairstatus = 0 AND sf.stakeNum = #{stakeNumber} ) ale, eomp_em_protocol_errcode pe WHERE ale.stakeNum = #{stakeNumber} AND ale. CODE = pe.errCode

SELECT ees.ID, ees.stakeNumber, ees.alias, sps. PORT, sps.chargeStatus, sps.portStatus, erc.chargerStatus, eri.chargingInfo, bms.bmsInfo FROM eomp_em_stake ees LEFT JOIN eomp_rtm_stakeportstatus sps ON ees.stakeNumber = sps.stakeNum LEFT JOIN eomp_rtm_chargerstatus erc ON sps.stakeNum = erc.stakeNum AND sps. PORT = erc.PORT LEFT JOIN eomp_rtm_charginginfo eri ON sps.stakeNum = eri.stakeNum AND sps. PORT = eri.PORT LEFT JOIN eomp_rtm_bmsInfo bms ON sps.stakeNum = bms.stakeNum AND sps. PORT = bms.PORT WHERE ees.stakeNumber = #{stakeNumber}

SELECT a.*, s.alias stakeAlias, s.ID stakeId, f.errText alarmName, g.advice, t.stationName stationName FROM eomp_rtm_stakealarm a LEFT JOIN eomp_em_stake s ON a.stakeNum = s.stakeNumber LEFT JOIN eomp_em_station t ON t.ID = s.stationId LEFT JOIN eomp_em_protocol_errcode f ON f.errCode = a.alarm AND f.errType = 0 LEFT JOIN eomp_sys_expertlib g ON g.exceptionCode = a.alarm WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0' AND ( s.id IN ( SELECT d.bizID FROM eomp_sys_datarole d LEFT JOIN eomp_sys_org o ON d.orgID = o.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND d.bizIDFlag = 1 AND d.userID = #{userId} AND FIND_IN_SET( o.id, queryChildrenOrgInfo ( #{orgId} ) ) ) )

SELECT a.*, s.alias stakeAlias, s.ID stakeId, f.errText faultName, g.advice, t.stationName stationName FROM eomp_rtm_stakefault a LEFT JOIN eomp_em_stake s ON a.stakeNum = s.stakeNumber LEFT JOIN eomp_em_station t ON t.ID = s.stationId LEFT JOIN eomp_em_protocol_errcode f ON f.errCode = a.fault AND f.errType = 1 LEFT JOIN eomp_sys_expertlib g ON g.exceptionCode = a.fault WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0' AND ( s.id IN ( SELECT d.bizID FROM eomp_sys_datarole d LEFT JOIN eomp_sys_org o ON d.orgID = o.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND d.bizIDFlag = 1 AND d.userID = #{userId} AND FIND_IN_SET( o.id, queryChildrenOrgInfo ( #{orgId} ) ) ) )
